1.title: Transformers movie review
1.plot: The Transformers movie by Michael Bay is already 11 years old. In this series Blabbermouth talks about older Movies and Games and see if they have aged well.

2.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen movie review
2.plot: The 2nd Transformers movie by Michael Bay is seen as one of the worst in the franchise and is now 9 years old. In the new new series called 'HOW IS IT NOW?'. In this series I talk about older Movies and Games and see if they have aged well.

3.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon movie review
3.plot: The 3rd Transformers movie by Michael Bay is my favorite of the franchise and is now 7 years old. In the new new series called 'HOW IS IT NOW?' I talk about older Movies and Games and see if they have aged well.

4.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction movie review
4.plot: The fourth Transformers movie also known as Transformers: Age of Extinction is the first that doesn't feature any actors of the original trilogy. It stars Mark Wahlberg, Stanley Tucci, Kelsey Grammer and Nicola Peltz.

5.title: Transformers: The Last Knight movie review
5.plot: This is a review of Transformers: The Last Knight one year after the release of the movie. How is it now? Is it better than it was? Is it worse than it was? The film stars Mark Wahlberg, Anthony Hopkins, Isabela Moner and Josh Duhamel.

imdb.plot outline: In "How Is It Now?", Dennis Veldhuizen portrays as BlabberMouth where he talks about older movies and video games. He re watches the title and decides how it holds up after several year. Is it better than before? Is it worse than before? Let BlabberMouth tell you.
imdb.title: How Is It Now?
plot: In "_How Is It Now?_ (qv)", Dennis Veldhuizen portrays as BlabberMouth where he talks about older movies and video games. He re watches the title and decides how it holds up after several year. Is it better than before? Is it worse than before? Let BlabberMouth tell you.::Dennis Veldhuizen
